start: ^You wake up to the sound of your alarm. It's 8:30 AM — your class starts at 9:00.
^Snooze the alarm and sleep a bit longer.
^Get up immediately and start getting ready.

c-0: ^You sleep for another 15 minutes. When you wake up again, your heart races.
c-1: ^You push yourself out of bed and start moving.
c-2: ^You scroll through messages and see a few unread emails from your teacher.

after_alarm: ^You grab your bag and head for the door.
^Sit down and have a full breakfast anyway.

c-1: ^You brew a quick cup and take it with you.

arrive_school: ^By the time you reach school, you reflect on your morning.

b: ^You feel grounded and ready for the day.
^You’re a little on edge, but focused.
^You feel tense and distracted — it's going to be a tough day.
